title: Comparing change in linear momentum between masses

content.question: Identical net forces act for the same length of time on two different spherical masses. Which of the following describes the change in linear momentum of the smaller mass compared to that of the larger mass?

choices.label: It is smaller than the change in linear momentum of the larger mass but not zero.
It is larger than the change in linear momentum of the larger mass.
It is equal to the change in linear momentum of the larger mass.
It depends on the relative diameters of the two masses.

content.answer: It is equal to the change in linear momentum of the larger mass.

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
